lead_paragraph: The suspect, Samy Mohamed Hamzeh, 23, was charged with illegally buying a machine gun and a silencer to carry out the attack at a Masonic temple in the city.
snippet: The suspect, Samy Mohamed Hamzeh, 23, was charged with illegally buying a machine gun and a silencer to carry out the attack at a Masonic temple in the city.

headline.main: Suspect Is Charged in Milwaukee With Planning a Mass Shooting
headline.print_headline: Wisconsin Man Charged With Plotting Mass Shooting

abstract: Federal prosecutors say they have arrested Milwaukee man Samy Mohamed Hamzeh, who is charged with illegally buying machine gun in connection with apparent plans for mass shooting at Masonic temple in city; investigators say Hamzeh has not been charged with terrorism but that investigation is ongoing.
